Articles.Content:
So, I've been working on this for about a week in total. It's a lightly armored battlecruiser with loads of weapons strapped onto it. It currently weighs in at 477.9 tonnes with 651 parts. I've yet to finish building all the modules I'm going to place into the cargo bays. Let me know what you think of it!

Get the .craft file [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0f9ss8oit2p3ztx/%5BUFKR%5D%20Battlecruiser%20Mk%20I.craft?dl=0).

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/hlvae)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/w0kzK)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T10:39:42Z" title="06/22/2015 10:39  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by AlexanderTeaH**

> 
> That's one beautiful looking craft.

I tend to go for aesthetics over functionality. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Bet it's quite the beast to run too, with all those parts.

> 
> Bet it's quite the beast to run too, with all those parts.

Yes, the current version of this ship (with nearly **800** parts) takes my machine down to 5 frames/second.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-17T17:10:05Z" title="06/17/2015 05:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 17, 2015</time> by AlexanderTeaH**

Finished it and re-posted it to my re-opened thread [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80540-STOCK-United-Federation-of-Kerbal-Republics-GRAND-RE-OPENING!-MILITARY-CRAFT).

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/hlvae)
Good lord, that thing looks like it would melt processors, to say nothing of actually getting it into space. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Good lord, that thing looks like it would melt processors, to say nothing of actually getting it into space. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Haven't tried building a launcher for it, I just used **HyperEdit** to get it into space. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Hey Alex do you want me to have a crack at building a launcher for this craft? 

Btw... I LOVE IT, looks amazing man

> 
> Hey Alex do you want me to have a crack at building a launcher for this craft? 
> Btw... I LOVE IT, looks amazing man

Thanks! It means so much to me that someone appreciates the aesthetics of my crafts because that's where most of my efforts go when I make them! And second of all, sure! I'd love to see you make a launcher for it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Added link to the .craft file to the main post. Enjoy!

> 
> Hey Alex do you want me to have a crack at building a launcher for this craft? 
> Btw... I LOVE IT, looks amazing man

So, have you given it a shot yet? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Awesome Battlecruiser! I'd try it but my computer would melt ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Awesome Battlecruiser! I'd try it but my computer would melt ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Glad you like it! Too bad you can't load it up to see it for yourself. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
